root.item: For detail errors, please view the log.
The operation is processing, please wait.
DataSource configuration file not exist or format error.
Module "${0}" has been merged to module "${1}".
Module "${0}" has been upgraded. Database version: ${1}.
Module "${0}" has been merged to module "${1}".
Error occurs while copying file ${0}. The file may be in use, or locked for other reasons. Press "Finish" to exit, Press "Retry" to retry, Press "Ignore" to skip this file (NOT RECOMMENDED).
* This wizard will extract the software to runnable program. You should read the following agreement first.

Please select these items. Wizard will compose the program by your selection, and create a default H2 database.
Extraction is not completed, are you sure to terminate?
Extraction finished with ${0} SQL error(s), please check the log.

* Before upgrading, please read the following agreement carefully. In particular, you need to stop the application server, back up the original installation directory and database information before the upgrade to prevent data damage or lost by accident.

Please select the installation directory, web directory and extension directory needs upgrade. Upgrade wizard will upgrade files in the directories, and upgrade the database(s).
Please select a valid installation directory.
SQL order can not be identical in a same datasource.
Upgrade finished with ${0} SQL error(s), please check the log.
When upgrading, forced quit is likely to result in an error state. Are you sure to quit?
Configuration the default datasource. You can use the default embedded H2 database or other databases. If use other databases, perform data initialization before the first startup.
Database has been initialized and can not be initialized twice.
Are you sure to initialize the database "${0}"?
Configuration saved successfully. It will take effect the next time you start the application server.
Please select the datasource to modify.
Please select the datasource to delete.
When initializing, forced quit will result in an error state. Are you sure to quit?
Please select the DataSource to export.
* Please read the following instructions first. In particular, you need to shut down the application server before export to ensure the data integrity.
Export to a single file (for small amount of data)
DataSource configuration file is invalid. Please see the console for detail information.
An error occurred while exporting data for table "${0}".
An error occurred while generating drop statement for table "${0}".
An error occurred while exporting structure for table "${0}".
When exporting, forced quit will make the exported data unusable. Are you sure to quit?
* Please read the instructions first. In particular, you should ensure that the target database is empty (no existing table).
Cannot import data to DataSource "${0}": data does not exist.
When importing, forced quit will result in an error state. Are you sure to quit?
